## Attribute interface

Attribute contains the attribute\_type of the specified attribute\_code and entity\_type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Attribute 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attribute\_code?](./magento-api.attribute.attribute_code.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The unique identifier for an attribute code. This value should be in lowercase letters without spaces. |
|  [attribute\_options?](./magento-api.attribute.attribute_options.md) | Maybe&lt;Array&lt;Maybe&lt;[AttributeOption](./magento-api.attributeoption.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Attribute options list. |
|  [attribute\_type?](./magento-api.attribute.attribute_type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The data type of the attribute |
|  [entity\_type?](./magento-api.attribute.entity_type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of entity that defines the attribute |
|  [input\_type?](./magento-api.attribute.input_type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The frontend input type of the attribute |
